title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: A housing scheme aimed at providing affordable housing to rural households by 2022.

title: Swachh Bharat Mission (SBM)
description: A campaign to make India clean and free from open defecation by constructing toilets and improving sanitation.

title: MGNREGA
description: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act provides 100 days of guaranteed wage employment to rural households.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: A crop insurance scheme to provide financial support to farmers in case of crop failure due to natural calamities.
